content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 11, "index": 12}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 49, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 18}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 55, "index": 25}, {"type": "pink_tulip", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_carpet", "quantity": 59, "index": 27}, {"type": "filled_map", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 19, "index": 34}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 53, "index": 42}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft andesite_stairs, I first need to craft andesite. To do so, I need to place 1 diorite and 1 cobblestone side by side in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move the diorite from slot 14 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 11, "index": 12}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 5, "index": 15}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 49, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 16, "index": 18}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 42, "index": 19}, {"type": "sandstone_slab", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 55, "index": 25}, {"type": "pink_tulip", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_carpet", "quantity": 59, "index": 27}, {"type": "filled_map", "quantity": 55, "index": 28}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_block", "quantity": 19, "index": 34}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}, {"type": "nether_gold_ore", "quantity": 53, "index": 42}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}]

thought: Since the diorite has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the cobblestone to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the cobblestone to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
